data.title: English length units conversion
data.statement:
You have to convert an English length unit into another one.
You are given the relations needed to calculate some unit into some other unit.

Note: You might know that 1 nautic mile = 6080 feet and not 6000 feet. For the purpose of this puzzle, we removed this contradiction.

testCases.title: Direct relations
testCases.testIn:
inch in twip
3
1 point = 20 twip
1 inch = 12 line
1 line = 6 point

testCases.title: Direct relations
testCases.testIn:
inch in twip
3
1 point = 20 twip
1 pica = 12 point
1 inch = 6 pica

testCases.testIn:

4
1 point = 20 twip
1 line = 6 point
1 inch = 12 line
1 inch = 6 pica

8 finger = 7 inch

1 stick = 2 inch

data.constraints: The numbers in the relations are integers, not always ones on the left, the smallest numbers possible.
data.stubGenerator:
read toconvert:string(40)
read n:int
loop n read relation:string(40)
write result
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: [[unit 1]] in [[unit 2]]
<<Line 2>>: The number [[n]] of relations below
<<Next [[n]] lines>>: {{number}} [[unit x]] = {{number}} [[unit y]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You have to convert an English length unit into another one.
You are given the relations needed to calculate some unit into some other unit.

Note: You might know that 1 nautic mile = 6080 feet and not 6000 feet. For the purpose of this puzzle, we removed this contradiction.
Input
Line 1: unit 1 in unit 2
Line 2: The number n of relations below
Next n lines: number unit x = number unit y
Output
number unit 1 = number unit 2
Constraints
The numbers in the relations are integers, not always ones on the left, the smallest numbers possible.
Example
Input
inch in twip
3
1 point = 20 twip
1 inch = 12 line
1 line = 6 point
Output
1 inch = 1440 twip
